directions: Pulse garbanzo beans, cilantro, and onion in a blender or food processor until roughly chopped; stir. Add garlic, cumin, cayenne pepper, and sea salt; pulse, adding reserved garbanzo liquid until desired thickness is reached. Pour olive oil and lemon juice into hummus and stir.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and 1/4 cup liquid reserved
1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
title: Purple Fiddle Hummus
